casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Timothy TRAHEY, Petitioner No. 232 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. October 23, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 23 rd day of October, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:

Do the facts and circumstances in this case justify a warrantless blood draw under the exigent circumstances exception to the warrant requirement?
